10#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/matched_filter_lag_aggregator.h"
11
12#include <algorithm>
13#include <iterator>
14
15#include "modules/audio_processing/logging/apm_data_dumper.h"
16#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
17
18namespace webrtc {
19
20MatchedFilterLagAggregator::MatchedFilterLagAggregator(
21 ApmDataDumper* data_dumper,
22 size_t max_filter_lag,
23 const EchoCanceller3Config::Delay::DelaySelectionThresholds& thresholds)
24 : data_dumper_(data_dumper),
25 histogram_(max_filter_lag + 1, 0),
26 thresholds_(thresholds) {
27 RTC_DCHECK(data_dumper);
28 RTC_DCHECK_LE(thresholds_.initial, thresholds_.converged);
29 histogram_data_.fill(0);
30}
31
32MatchedFilterLagAggregator::~MatchedFilterLagAggregator() = default;
33
34void MatchedFilterLagAggregator::Reset(bool hard_reset) {
35 std::fill(histogram_.begin(), histogram_.end(), 0);
36 histogram_data_.fill(0);
37 histogram_data_index_ = 0;
38 if (hard_reset) {
39 significant_candidate_found_ = false;
40 }
41}
42
43absl::optional<DelayEstimate> MatchedFilterLagAggregator::Aggregate(
44 rtc::ArrayView<const MatchedFilter::LagEstimate> lag_estimates) {
45 // Choose the strongest lag estimate as the best one.
46 float best_accuracy = 0.f;
47 int best_lag_estimate_index = -1;
48 for (size_t k = 0; k < lag_estimates.size(); ++k) {
49 if (lag_estimates[k].updated && lag_estimates[k].reliable) {
50 if (lag_estimates[k].accuracy > best_accuracy) {
51 best_accuracy = lag_estimates[k].accuracy;
52 best_lag_estimate_index = static_cast<int>(k);
53 }
54 }
55 }
56
57 // TODO(peah): Remove this logging once all development is done.
58 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_echo_path_delay_estimator_best_index",
59 best_lag_estimate_index);
60 data_dumper_->DumpRaw("aec3_echo_path_delay_estimator_histogram", histogram_);
61
62 if (best_lag_estimate_index != -1) {
63 RTC_DCHECK_GT(histogram_.size(), histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_]);
64 RTC_DCHECK_LE(0, histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_]);
65 --histogram_[histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_]];
66
67 histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_] =
68 lag_estimates[best_lag_estimate_index].lag;
69
70 RTC_DCHECK_GT(histogram_.size(), histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_]);
71 RTC_DCHECK_LE(0, histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_]);
72 ++histogram_[histogram_data_[histogram_data_index_]];
73
74 histogram_data_index_ =
75 (histogram_data_index_ + 1) % histogram_data_.size();
76
77 const int candidate =
78 std::distance(histogram_.begin(),
79 std::max_element(histogram_.begin(), histogram_.end()));
80
81 significant_candidate_found_ =
82 significant_candidate_found_ ||
83 histogram_[candidate] > thresholds_.converged;
84 if (histogram_[candidate] > thresholds_.converged ||
85 (histogram_[candidate] > thresholds_.initial &&
86 !significant_candidate_found_)) {
87 DelayEstimate::Quality quality = significant_candidate_found_
88 ? DelayEstimate::Quality::kRefined
89 : DelayEstimate::Quality::kCoarse;
90 return DelayEstimate(quality, candidate);
91 }
92 }
93
94 return absl::nullopt;
95}
96
97} // namespace webrtc
